answers.answer: I was told a lot of people fail the first test. Like 80 percent. But it Doesnt mean you will fail the second one.there isnt much u can do to try and pass it cuz ur supposed to fast for 12 hours before taking it.
Ok well I guess I'll just have to wait till my second test and pray everything come out perfectly thank you :-D

Worse that could happen is gestational diabetes.   I had that with my first child and was able to control it by changing my diet.  I never needed insulin.   It wasn't that big of a deal and it went away after my son was born.
I failed it this time around. But passed the three hour. I asked my friends and its extremely common. Just extremely annoying! Bring a book. It's boring.

question: Hi there.. I just did my glucose test today i failed it..it had to be 140 or less and came up to 146... Now I have to do a 3 hour test.. What can it be happening how can I make sure I do pass the next test??  is not like I don't eat healthy plus I don't eat sugary stuff :| am just worry..Plus I have thyroid too can.this.be affecting as well??
title: Glucose test FAILED
